channel.title: Comments for page "Opposites Attract"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Opposites Attract"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Are you saying this from using the team and paying attention to what it seems to affect for you, or are you just saying that based off of conjecture?

From what I recall when I used this team, it was saying giving a +10% winnings bonus on each line that I won something on ( though I realize that it can't affect items won, and still displayed the normal amount of ryo for the winning line ).

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I think the information about their team bonus is incorrect.

It seems to not be a 10% boost to Ryo gained from the Jackpot, but rather a 10% boost to the chance of winning something.

item.title: incorrect range
item.content:encoded: i just wanted to menion that the range stated in total bonus is incorrect. the +2gen range should not be there!
